alert.note: Alert for Washington (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 24 at 10:37AM CST until January 31 at 10:48PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in New Orleans LA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Louisiana...Mississippi... Pearl River Near Bogalusa affecting Washington and Pearl River Counties. Pearl River Near Pearl River affecting Hancock, St. Tammany and Pearl River Counties. For the Lower Pearl River...including Bogalusa, Pearl River...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON TO WEDNESDAY, JANUARY 31... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River near Bogalusa. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon to Wednesday, January 31. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Woodlands and crop acreage along the river will be flooded. The Bogue Chitto Wildlife Management area will be inundated with water in recreational camps and over access roads. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 8.7 feet. - Bankfull stage is 15.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Friday afternoon to a crest of 20.0 feet early Sunday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday, January 31. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 20.0 feet on 02/14/2021. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lix. Click on the Rivers and Lakes menu for forecasts and observations. The next statement will be issued this evening. late tonight at 445 AM CST.
